channel.title: Services on Pionia
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Pionia

item.title: Services
item.description: Some actions like list, delete, create, retrieve/details, random, updated, are provided by default. You can still add more actions as you see fit.

item.title: Actions
item.description: Actions are the central logic for the entire app, this will guide you on handling actions in Pionia Framework.

item.title: Generic Services
item.description: All business logic in Pionia is stored in services. This guide will show you how to create, protect and use services in Pionia.

item.title: Advanced Generic Services
item.description: Pionia Generic Services can be used for more than CRUD operations. This guide shows you how to use them.
